description: This script generates an OpenAPI specification for a FastAPI application by importing the app instance, invoking its openapi() method, and writing the resulting schema to a JSON file. It also ensures the output directory exists and performs basic validation of the generated schema.

methods.name: dict _generate_openapi_dict()
methods.description: Builds and returns the OpenAPI dictionary generated from the FastAPI app by invoking app.openapi().

methods.name: None _write_openapi(schema: dict, out_path: str)
methods.description: Writes the given OpenAPI schema dictionary to a specified file path as JSON, formatted for readability.

methods.name: None main()
methods.description: Main function that orchestrates the generation of the OpenAPI schema, ensures output directory exists, validates the schema, and writes it to disk.
